comment: Just had my first beer from this batch and wow! You can't get any closer to a fat tug than this! Great beer recipe and easy to follow. Highly recommend.
Thanks Charlie Murphy, your input really help contribute to making this the great hate that it was
What a great recipie... Just brewed it myself as well, couldn't get the same efficency as you. But in love with the dry bitterness, the dry hopping idea was perfect. Thanks
